availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Served in the 45th Kentucky Infantry (U.S.A.) as Second Lieutenant from July 10, 1863 to October 17, 1863. Served in the 45th Kentucky Infantry (U.S.A.) as Major from October 17, 1863 to November 3, 1863. Served in the 45th Kentucky Infantry (U.S.A.) as Lieutenant Colonel from November 3, 1863 to.

ab.bibl:
Compiled Service Records of Volunteer Union Soldiers who Served in Organizations From State of Kentucky, NARA RG 94, Microfilm Series M397, Roll 436.
Find A Grave, "Ltc Lewis M. Clark (1837-1917)," Memorial #93936730, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/93936730 (accessed June 12, 2020).
